name: Windows 11 OS
description:
Windows 11 realistic mockup great use for apps

By Aquarias Verizon


Versions-


-5.07.07-

Minor changes


  • BETA for all Auto Layout is open Since there are bugs in the layout please write in the comments if I did anything wrong.
  • Bug fixes
  • New Cover
  • More components
  • App Screen Component now available for making your designs more realistic.
  • 2 Backgrounds are also available in the Background page.

-4.10.01-

BIG UPDATE WHOO HOO!!!

A lot of work has gone into this file it'll stay free until later notice.


Made free to you by Aquarias Verizon industries.


  • Bug fixes
  • New components
  • more weather icons
  • all updates till march 8
  • Prototype fixes
  • Auto layout is also available for taskbar for making it easier to add new app icons
  • and more...

  • Bug fixes in file
  • Time now available


-3.56.06-

  • Taskbar alignment is now able to be made to go left or center.

  • New components page is available for easy access.

  • Name Change and tag change plus new file cover.

  • New UI looks.
